TypeSignature.Value: public struct Nullable<T> where T : struct
.class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Nullable`1<struct .ctor (class System.ValueType) T> extends System.ValueType
generic <typename T> where T : value classpublic value class Nullable

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 泛型型別的基礎實值型別。

span.span: The underlying value type of the generic type.

summary.span: 表示可以指派 的實值類型。

span.span: Represents a value type that can be assigned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 型別即為可為 null，如果它可以指派值，或可以指派`null`，這表示型別沒有任何值。A type is said to be nullable if it can be assigned a value or can be assigned `null`, which means the type has no value whatsoever. 根據預設，所有必須參考型別，例如，可為 null，但所有實值類型，例如，不是。By default, all reference types, such as , are nullable, but all value types, such as , are not. 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，您將標示為可為 null 的實值型別使用`?`實值型別後的標記法。In C# and Visual Basic, you mark a value type as nullable by using the `?` notation after the value type. 例如， `int?` C# 中或`Integer?`Visual Basic 中宣告可指派的整數值型別`null`。For example, `int?` in C# or `Integer?` in Visual Basic declares an integer value type that can be assigned `null`. 結構，支援使用只有實值類型為 null 的型別，因為參考型別可以是 null 的設計。The structure supports using only a value type as a nullable type because reference types are nullable by design. 類別會提供補充支援結構。The class provides complementary support for the structure. 類別支援取得基礎型別可為 null 的型別，並對其基礎實值型別可為 null 類型的比較和等號比較作業不支援泛型的比較和等號比較作業。The class supports obtaining the underlying type of a nullable type, and comparison and equality operations on pairs of nullable types whose underlying value type does not support generic comparison and equality operations. ## 基本內容Fundamental Properties 兩個基本成員結構是否和屬性。The two fundamental members of the structure are the and properties. 如果屬性物件`true`，可以使用存取物件的值屬性。If the property for a object is `true`, the value of the object can be accessed with the property. 如果屬性是`false`，物件的值會是未定義並嘗試存取屬性會擲回。If the property is `false`, the value of the object is undefined and an attempt to access the property throws an . ## Boxing 和 UnboxingBoxing and Unboxing 當可為 null 的型別為 boxed 時，common language runtime 自動方塊的基礎值物件，不物件本身。When a nullable type is boxed, the common language runtime automatically boxes the underlying value of the object, not the object itself. 也就是說，如果屬性是`true`，內容屬性會進行 boxed 處理。That is, if the property is `true`, the contents of the property is boxed. Unboxed 實的基礎值為 null 的類型時，通用語言執行平台建立新結構初始化為基礎的值。When the underlying value of a nullable type is unboxed, the common language runtime creates a new structure initialized to the underlying value. 如果`HasValue`屬性為 null 的類型是`false`，boxing 作業的結果是`null`。If the `HasValue` property of a nullable type is `false`, the result of a boxing operation is `null`. 因此，如果經過 boxing 處理 null 的型別傳遞至預期的物件引數的方法，該方法必須準備好處理的情況，其中的引數是`null`。Consequently, if a boxed nullable type is passed to a method that expects an object argument, that method must be prepared to handle the case where the argument is `null`. 當`null`是 unbox 處理成可為 null 的型別，通用語言執行平台建立新結構，並初始化其`HasValue`屬性設`false`。When `null` is unboxed into a nullable type, the common language runtime creates a new structure and initializes its `HasValue` property to `false`. ## [!INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)] 和 Windows 執行階段元件 and Windows Runtime Components 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)]，您可以包含WinMD 程式庫中匯出的結構成員的型別。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)], you can include a type as a member of a structure exported in a WinMD library. 先前，這不支援。Previously, this was not supported. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義 Microsoft Pubs 範例資料庫中資料表的三個資料列。The following code example defines three rows of a table in the Microsoft Pubs sample database. 此資料表包含不可以是 null 的兩個資料行和兩個資料行可為 null。The table contains two columns that are not nullable and two columns that are nullable. [!code-cpp[system.nullableOfT.class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullableOfT.class/cpp/tarow.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[system.nullableOfT.class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullableOfT.class/cs/tarow.cs#1)] [!code-vb[system.nullableOfT.class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullableOfT.class/vb/tarow.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性與目前結構`true`而`other`引數不是`null`，等號比較取決於傳遞`other`參數來`Equals`方法基礎值的目前結構。If the property of the current structure is `true` and the `other` argument is not `null`, equality is determined by passing the `other` parameter to the `Equals` method of the underlying value of the current structure. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會判斷物件與物件是否等於目前物件。The following code example determines whether an object and a object are equal to the current object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回值，即使屬性是`false`(不同於屬性，則會擲回例外狀況)。The method returns a value even if the property is `false` (unlike the property, which throws an exception). 如果屬性是`false`，則方法會傳回[預設](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/default-values-table.md)基礎型別的值。If the property is `false`, the method returns the [default](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/default-values-table.md) value of the underlying type. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會擷取的值物件如果該值是定義; 否則它會擷取預設值或特定的預設值。The following code example retrieves the value of a object if that value is defined; otherwise, it retrieves the default value or a specific default value. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是`true`，在目前的值物件可以使用存取屬性。If the property is `true`, the value of the current object can be accessed with the property. 否則，嘗試存取其值會擲回例外狀況。Otherwise, attempting to access its value throws an exception. ## Examples 下列範例會使用的屬性`Nullable`(`Nullable(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中) 來判斷是否它應該會顯示物件的物件屬性或其屬性。The following example uses the property of a `Nullable` (`Nullable(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic) object to determine whether it should display the object's property or its property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此運算子支援目前的明確轉換類型的執行個體`T`的型別。This operator supports the explicit conversion of the current instance to type `T`, the type of . 這類明確轉換的語法與語言相關。The syntax for such explicit conversions is language-dependent. 您也可以執行轉換，藉由呼叫方法。You may also be able to perform the conversion by calling the method. 這個運算子的對等方法是 The equivalent method for this operator is ## Examples 運算子可讓程式碼，如下所示，它會將轉換`Nullable(Of Int32)`值值。The operator enables code such as the following, which converts a `Nullable(Of Int32)` value to an value. summary.span: 建立已經初始化為指定值的新 物件。

span.span: Creates a new object initialized to a specified value.

returns.span: 物件，其 屬性已經使用 參數加以初始化。

span.span: A object whose property is initialized with the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`參數不是`null`，則屬性的新值已初始化為`value`參數和屬性會初始化為`true`。If the `value` parameter is not `null`, the property of the new value is initialized to the `value` parameter and the property is initialized to `true`. 如果`value`參數是`null`，則屬性的新值已初始化為預設值，也就是全部二進位零的值，而屬性會初始化為`false`.If the `value` parameter is `null`, the property of the new value is initialized to the default value, which is the value that is all binary zeroes, and the property is initialized to `false`. 這個運算子的對等方法是 The equivalent method for this operator is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果類型的值`T`尚未指派給物件，您可以比較它`null`，並擷取其屬性，但您無法存取其屬性或呼叫其他成員。If a value of type `T` has not been assigned to the object, you can compare it to `null` and retrieve its property, but you cannot access its property or call its other members. ## Examples 下列範例會使用的屬性`Nullable`(`Nullable(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中) 來判斷是否它應該會顯示物件的物件屬性或其屬性。The following example uses the property of a `Nullable` (`Nullable(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic) object to determine whether it should display the object's property or its property.
